title.narrative: Public Financial Management for Rural Development Program - Subprogram 2

description.narrative: The program's objective is to assist in implementing public financial management (PFM) reforms in three rural development ministries, including support to strengthen the capacity of the National Audit Authority (NAA). The program and related project will improve the overall governance framework and support government efforts to meet PFM benchmarks essential to allocating resources efficiently and managing expenditures effectively, transparently, and accountably.

participating-org.narrative: General Secretary of the Council for Administrative Reform
Ministry of Water Resources and Meteorology

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President

MAP implemented by three RDMs to at least 90% average achievement by mid-2011 relating to (i) strategic budget plan and program budgting; (ii) internal aduit; (iii) use of SOP, Procurement Manula and FMM for all externally-assisted projects.
